job_title: Python developer (RCM - HL7- EDI Experience is Mandatory)
jd: From: Pavan, Acies IT Solutions pavanv@aciesit.com Reply to: pavanv@aciesit.com HI, we have a new job opening below. Please see below. Python developer (RCM - HL7- EDI Experience is Mandatory) 100% remote Open for C2C Note : Please dont send NON Matching resumes. We are seeking skilled Python Developers with strong experience in healthcare RCM (Revenue Cycle Management) automation. The ideal candidates will have a deep understanding of healthcare APIs (such as HL7, FHIR, and EDI 837/835) and the ability to design, develop, and maintain automated solutions to optimize RCM workflows. Responsibilities:- Develop, test, and maintain Python-based automation solutions for healthcare RCM applications.- Integrate and interact with various healthcare APIs (HL7, FHIR, EDI, etc.) to facilitate seamless data exchange between systems.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams (RCM analysts, coding specialists, etc.) to understand automation requirements and develop efficient solutions.- Build, deploy, and manage scalable and reliable healthcare data processing pipelines.- Troubleshoot and resolve issues in the automation of RCM processes, ensuring high data accuracy and compliance with healthcare regulations.- Optimize existing processes and develop new features to improve the RCM automation systems.- Stay updated on healthcare technology trends, particularly those relevant to RCM and data exchange standards. Requirements:Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in Python development with a focus on healthcare automation.Healthcare API Knowledge: In-depth experience with healthcare APIs such as HL7, FHIR, EDI 837/835, and other relevant data exchange standards.RCM Automation: Proven experience in automating complex workflows within the healthcare revenue cycle, including eligibility, claims processing, payments, and denials management.Integration Skills: Experience integrating with third-party healthcare software (EHR/EMR systems, billing software, etc.).Problem-Solving: Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills to handle complex data and workflow scenarios.Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills to collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Preferred Qualifications:- Experience with Azure cloud platforms and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).- Familiarity with machine learning techniques for predictive analytics in RCM processes.
